name: unrevised
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not changed, corrected, or considered again: This is an uncorrected, unrevised copy of the transcript. GDP growth was unrevised from an initial estimate of 0.7 per cent. Related word
revise
More examplesFewer examplesShe emailed me the unrevised minutes from the sales team meeting.It is not unusual for key pieces of legislation to remain unrevised when there is an urgent need for improvement.The Office for National Statistics also left the annual rate of growth unrevised at 0.3 per cent.
